definition: military sports/military fitness (curriculum etc)/abbr. to 軍體|军体

sentences.english: An application that can run statics analysis on sports matches .
sentences.chinese: 一個應用程序可以運行在體育靜力學的研究與分析。

sentences.english: A crowd of more than 84, 000 people attended the World Cup final at Soccer City Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 000多人觀看了在足球城體育場舉行的世界盃決賽。

sentences.english: The popular PE is the major part of the whole career of PE.
sentences.chinese: 羣衆體育是構成整個體育事業的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The popular PE is the major part of the whole career of PE.
sentences.chinese: 羣衆體育是構成整個體育事業的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: NOC is Yuan Weimin, Ministry of the state General Administration for Sports.
sentences.chinese: 現任中國奧委會主席是國家體育總局局長袁偉民。

sentences.english: Only those sports which are practised on snow or ice are considered as winter sports.
sentences.chinese: 只有雪上和冰上項目才被認爲是冬季體育運動。

sentences.english: How does that ever allow you to advertise in connection with sports?
sentences.chinese: 這樣你們就可以做與體育賽事有關的廣告了？

sentences.english: Hey, that's the economic reality in sports and sports departments today.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，今天體育界和媒體體育部的經濟現狀就是如此。

sentences.english: Hey, that's the economic reality in sports and sports departments today.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，今天體育界和媒體體育部的經濟現狀就是如此。

sentences.english: Nearlly all the sports practised nowadays are competitive.
sentences.chinese: 今天幾乎所有的體育活動都是競賽性的。

sentences.english: Laser battle is fashionably military sport integrated with entertainment and training.
sentences.chinese: 雷戰是一種集娛樂和培訓於一身的時尚軍事體育運動。

sentences.english: People in Beijing love orts and take an active part in orts.
sentences.chinese: 北京人愛好體育並積極參加體育活動。

sentences.english: After we greeted, we went to play basketball in Liwan Gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 在我們迎接，我們去荔灣體育館打籃球。

sentences.english: Just watching it now on Sky Sports News.
sentences.chinese: 現在在天空體育臺的新聞看着。

sentences.english: In today's P. E. class, we are going to learn.
sentences.chinese: 今天的體育課，我們要去跤場學習摔跤。
